parameters.name: gatewayType
parameters.description: The instance type. Valid values: **AI** and **API**.

parameters.name: nameLike
parameters.description: The name used to perform a fuzzy search for operations.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. Pages start from 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.
